channel.title: Blender on Korbin Nevius
channel.description: Recent content in Blender on Korbin Nevius

item.title: Sci-Fi Render
item.description: First project that I rendered in Houdini. I made the model in Blender with the RandomFlow add-on by Blender Guppy. I then transitioned the model into Houdini for fixing the UVs. After, I transitioned to Substance Painter in order to texture everything and then finally moving back to Houdini to render in Solaris.

item.title: Nodevember - Asteroid Village
item.description: Utilizing the Nodevember prompt of Asteroid Village, I was able to use the accumulation of skills throughout the past month and the help of Erindale (City) to create this render.

item.title: Nodevember - Oceanic Wonder
item.description:
Utilizing the Nodevember prompt of Oceanic Wonder and the help of a community tutorial, I was able to create this group jellyfish render.

Jellyfish Animation

item.title: Apartment Flower
item.description:
My first big Blender project where I created everything on my own. I followed Ian Huberts lazy tutorial (tutorial) for the quick city and I used the magnolia flower I made while learning about UV mapping from another tutorial (tutorial).

My favorite part of the tutorial is how the flower sits in the glass vase filled with water. Some cools elements of the project is that an image of the moon provided by NASA is UV mapped to the moon and I have multiple light sources reflecting off the windows.
